articles.title: A cheap cubesat fleet could revolutionize gamma-ray burst detection - Space.com
articles.description: A miniature cubesat built by Eastern European astronomers has been detecting gamma-ray bursts since 2021.

articles.title: European stocks higher after Fed Chair Powell's comments; FTSE hits record high - CNBC
